articles.title: Theory-driven Analysis for Ecological Data
articles.contents:
The objective of this five-day workshop, co-organized by the FRB-CESAB and the GdR TheoMoDive. is to train young researchers in theory-based approaches to model ecological data (e.g. temporal series, macroecology, interaction and trophic network, etc.).
